query.name: find-by-options
query.statement: SELECT <FIELDS/> FROM <TABLE/> WHERE (CASE WHEN ${type} IS NULL OR <FIELD name='type'/> = ${type} THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END) AND (CASE WHEN ${target-id} IS NULL OR <FIELD name='target-id'/> = ${target-id} THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END) AND (CASE WHEN ${operation} IS NULL OR <FIELD name='operation'/> = ${operation} THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END) AND (CASE WHEN ${user-name} IS NULL OR <FIELD name='user-name'/> = ${user-name} THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END) AND (CASE WHEN ${client-ip} IS NULL OR <FIELD name='client-ip'/> = ${client-ip} THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END) AND (CASE WHEN ${from-datetime} IS NULL OR <FIELD name='datetime'/> >= ${from-datetime} THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END) AND (CASE WHEN ${to-datetime} IS NULL OR <FIELD name='datetime'/> <= ${to-datetime} THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END) LIMIT ${count}

query.name: find-by-options-with-success
query.statement: SELECT <FIELDS/> FROM <TABLE/> WHERE (CASE WHEN ${type} IS NULL OR <FIELD name='type'/> = ${type} THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END) AND (CASE WHEN ${target-id} IS NULL OR <FIELD name='target-id'/> = ${target-id} THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END) AND (CASE WHEN ${operation} IS NULL OR <FIELD name='operation'/> = ${operation} THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END) AND (CASE WHEN ${user-name} IS NULL OR <FIELD name='user-name'/> = ${user-name} THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END) AND (CASE WHEN ${client-ip} IS NULL OR <FIELD name='client-ip'/> = ${client-ip} THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END) AND (CASE WHEN ${from-datetime} IS NULL OR <FIELD name='datetime'/> >= ${from-datetime} THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END) AND (CASE WHEN ${to-datetime} IS NULL OR <FIELD name='datetime'/> <= ${to-datetime} THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END) AND <FIELD name='success'/> = ${success} LIMIT ${count}
